AMG Pack, ABS Brakes, Air Conditioning, Airbags, Alarm, Automatic, Auxiliary Audio Input, Bluetooth Ready, Central Locking, Climate Control, Cruise Control, Drink Holder, Electric Mirrors, Electric Seats, Electric Windows, Keyless Go, Leather, Multi-Function Steering, Panoramic Roof, Power Steering, Radio/CD/MP3, Rear Air Conditioning, Run-Flat Tyres, Smash and Grab Windows Tints, Sports Pack, Tinted Windows, Trip Computer, USB Input Paddleshift and Much More...
